subject: Simplest hash initialization with no value
body:
Hi,
	What is the simplest way to initialize the hash keys with no
values ?

	I know the crude form :

	%myhash =('A' => undef,
		    'B' => undef) ;

	Is there anything simpler than this ?
Thanks,
Alok

--
